title: How to Make a Capsicum Sandwich

steps.headline: Fry the sliced onion with the mustard oil until it is slightly browned.
steps.description: You can opt for any other type of cooking oil if you wish.

steps.headline: Add the ginger garlic paste to it and fry for about 2 minutes.
Add the sliced capsicum and fry for another 2 minutes.
Add the tomato, salt, chili powder (or cayenne pepper) and cumin powder and fry for 3 minutes.
steps.description: However, if you want to keep it simple you can avoid adding the Tomato or you can even experiment with other veggies of your choice.

steps.headline: Lower the temperature and cover the pan.
Switch off the stove after the spices have mixed in and cooked well.
steps.description: The mixture should absorb the flavour of the spices.

steps.headline: Add a cheese slice.
steps.description: Choose your favourite cheese and place a slice over either one of the bread slices or both if you wish.

steps.headline: Spread the capsicum spice mix over it and make a sandwich.
steps.description: Serve it with fries, soups, sauces or dips and enjoy!

text: Fry the sliced onion with the mustard oil until it is slightly browned. You can opt for any other type of cooking oil if you wish. Add the ginger garlic paste to it and fry for about 2 minutes.  Add the sliced capsicum and fry for another 2 minutes.  Add the tomato, salt, chili powder (or cayenne pepper) and cumin powder and fry for 3 minutes. However, if you want to keep it simple you can avoid adding the Tomato or you can even experiment with other veggies of your choice. Lower the temperature and cover the pan. Cook for another 2 minutes. Switch off the stove after the spices have mixed in and cooked well. The mixture should absorb the flavour of the spices. Toast the bread slices slightly.  Add a cheese slice. Choose your favourite cheese and place a slice over either one of the bread slices or both if you wish. Spread the capsicum spice mix over it and make a sandwich. Serve it with fries, soups, sauces or dips and enjoy! Finished.
